__e: With all my heart, I am grateful to you.
Thank you for making me so happy. But it is all bullshit!
With all my heart I thank you... for having added to my life one great, sweet measure of devotion.
And in any case, my mother says that no work is big or small... as long as you do it with all your heart.
Now, I love her with all my heart, and I promise to keep loving her and taking care of her for the rest of this life, the afterlife and whatever comes after that.
Do you understand now why it is so important to me for you to believe that I love you with all of my heart?
